video.synopsis: In a future where the elite inhabit an island paradise far from the crowded slums, you get one chance to join the 3% saved from squalor.

episodes.synopsis: In a grimy near-future, 20-year-olds stream to a sleek testing facility to compete for a spot in an idyllic land known as the Offshore.
episodes.title: Chapter 01: Cubes

episodes.synopsis: Fernando's medical exam yields a stunning discovery, a logic puzzle stokes tensions in the group, and Aline tries to find out what Ezequiel is hiding.
episodes.title: Chapter 02: Coins

episodes.synopsis: A nerve-wracking trip through a dark tunnel leaves Joana haunted by a vision from her past. Ezequiel receives an unexpected visitor.
episodes.title: Chapter 03: Corridor

episodes.synopsis: Trapped in the dorms without food or water, the candidates race to find a solution. A sudden change in the test brings out a new side of Marco.
episodes.title: Chapter 04: Gateway

episodes.synopsis: Painful memories come flooding back to Ezequiel as Aline reveals what she's learned and offers to keep it quiet -- for a price.
episodes.title: Chapter 05: Water

episodes.synopsis: Candidates find a tempting offer waiting for them in their new dorm rooms. Those who decide to stay face daunting individual tests.
episodes.title: Chapter 06: Glass

episodes.synopsis: A night of celebration turns chaotic as Process officials realize there's a traitor in their midst and begin interrogating the candidates.
episodes.title: Chapter 07: Capsule

episodes.synopsis: On the morning of the Purification Ritual, startling revelations and shifting loyalties leave the fates of four candidates hanging in the balance.
episodes.title: Chapter 08: Button

episodes.synopsis: With days to go before the next Process, Joana tries to prove herself to the leader of the Cause, and Michele faces an ultimatum from Ezequiel.
episodes.title: Chapter 01: Mirror

episodes.synopsis: As Rafael races to score a spot on the Inland squad, flashbacks recap his first year in the Offshore. Fernando reluctantly coaches Process hopefuls.
episodes.title: Chapter 02: Toaster

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to protect Glória, Fernando realizes there's another way to stop the Process. Michele and Rafael separately try to contact the Cause.
episodes.title: Chapter 03: Static

episodes.synopsis: Ivana and Joana subject their captives to grueling interrogations to find out who's telling the truth. Marcela reaches out to an Inlander for help.
episodes.title: Chapter 04: Napkin

episodes.synopsis: Michele and the others discover another side to Ezequiel as he retraces his turbulent journey from Process No. 80 to the present.
episodes.title: Chapter 05: Lamp

episodes.synopsis: As the hunt for Cause members heats up, Glória wrestles with nagging doubts, Michele and Joana search for the bomb, and Fernando makes a defiant move.
episodes.title: Chapter 06: Bottles

episodes.synopsis: Fernando finds an unlikely new ally. Michele undergoes a mysterious procedure. A crisis leaves Rafael torn between Elisa and his mission.
episodes.title: Chapter 07: Fog

episodes.synopsis: Joana finds herself at the mercy of a figure from her past, Michele is led to a remote hiding place, and Marcela receives an unexpected invitation.
episodes.title: Chapter 08: Frogs

episodes.synopsis: While Rafael, Fernando and Joana forge ahead with their plan, Michele discovers a shocking secret about the Offshore's past.
episodes.title: Chapter 09: Necklace

episodes.synopsis: Last-minute setbacks force Fernando and Joana to improvise. As chaos erupts on the day of the Process, Michele concocts a plan of her own.
episodes.title: Chapter 10: Blood

episodes.synopsis: Just as Joana tours Michele's new desert sanctuary, known as the Shell, a massive sandstorm moves in and wreaks havoc.
episodes.title: Chapter 01: Sand

episodes.synopsis: While the residents of the Shell prepare for the next stage of the Selection, Joana summons allies from the Cause and reveals her master plan.
episodes.title: Chapter 02: Scalpel

episodes.synopsis: Forced to stand in for Michele on the next test, Elisa finds herself longing for the Offshore. Artur struggles to hide his condition from Rafael.
episodes.title: Chapter 03: Medicine

episodes.synopsis: With supplies dwindling, Michele hurries to cut the Shell's remaining population in half. In flashbacks, the Founding Couple face an agonizing dilemma.
episodes.title: Chapter 04: Duck

episodes.synopsis: Glória whips up support for her campaign, leading to chaos at the Shell. Marco resorts to desperate measures when he runs out of food for his son.
episodes.title: Chapter 05: Lever

episodes.synopsis: With the Offshore contingent on the way, the Shell's new residents scour the desert for the fugitives. Elisa grapples with painful memories.
episodes.title: Chapter 06: Trapdoor

episodes.synopsis: While Joana and Rafael race to find proof of the sabotage, Michele faces an angry crowd, and new details emerge about Glória's time in the Process.
episodes.title: Chapter 07: Gardrone

episodes.synopsis: The truth about the sabotage finally comes to light as Marcela prepares to take over the Shell -- and carry out a secret personal mission.
episodes.title: Chapter 08: Wave

episodes.synopsis: When a group from the Shell is invited to the Offshore, Joana sees a chance for revenge. But she soon becomes distracted by unsettling memories.
episodes.title: Chapter 01: Moon

episodes.synopsis: After a surprise announcement from André, Michele begins training Xavier for a different kind of mission. Verônica escorts Joana to a secret meeting.
episodes.title: Chapter 02: Shock

episodes.synopsis: As the group prepares to raid the RTC, Glória makes a fateful deal, Michele finds herself trapped, and Rafael reconnects with a familiar face.
episodes.title: Chapter 03: Fire

episodes.synopsis: Forced to resort to plan B, Joana and the others flee to an underground hideout, where Natália wrestles with a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Chapter 04: Submarine

episodes.synopsis: As panic sweeps through the Offshore, Marcela scrambles to restore order, and Marco discovers his mother isn't the only family member on the island.
episodes.title: Chapter 05: Painting

episodes.synopsis: With tensions rising and rumors spreading fast, André locks down the Process building and presents four candidates with a harrowing final test.
episodes.title: Chapter 06: Buttons

episodes.synopsis: Waking up to a new reality, the Inland and Offshore factions inch closer to the brink of war — until a long-lost artifact offers a ray of hope.
episodes.title: Chapter 07: Sun
